Title: Establishes the "New York Teach Program" conditional tuition waiver
Summary: Establishes the New York Teach Program conditional tuition waiver; requires participants to teach at hard to staff school districts for four years after graduation in order to have tuition waived in full for accelerated bachelor's and master's degree programs in education.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the "New York Teach Program" conditional tuition waiver
